entities.name: ActionButton
entities.description:
## ActionButton

ActionButtons allow users to perform an action. They’re used for similar, task-based options within a workflow, and are ideal for interfaces where buttons aren’t meant to draw a lot of attention.

 [View documentation](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/react-spectrum/ActionButton.html)

entities.name: ActionGroup
entities.description:
## ActionGroup

An ActionGroup is a grouping of ActionButtons that are related to one another.

 [View documentation](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/react-spectrum/ActionGroup.html)

entities.name: Button
entities.description:
## Button

Buttons allow users to perform an action or to navigate to another page. They have multiple styles for various needs, and are ideal for calling attention to where a user needs to do something in order to move forward in a flow.

 [View documentation](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/react-spectrum/Button.html)

entities.name: ButtonGroup
entities.description:
## ButtonGroup

ButtonGroup handles overflow for a grouping of buttons whose actions are related to each other.

 [View documentation](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/react-spectrum/ButtonGroup.html)

entities.name: Checkbox
entities.description:
## Checkbox

Checkboxes allow users to select multiple items from a list of individual items, or to mark one individual item as selected.

 [View documentation](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/react-spectrum/Checkbox.html)

entities.name: RadioGroup
entities.description:
## RadioGroup

Radio buttons allow users to select a single option from a list of mutually exclusive options. All possible options are exposed up front for users to compare.

 [View documentation](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/react-spectrum/RadioGroup.html)

entities.name: SearchField
entities.description:
## SearchField

A SearchField is a text field designed for searches.

 [View documentation](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/react-spectrum/SearchField.html)

entities.name: Dialog
entities.description:
## Dialog

Dialogs are windows containing contextual information, tasks, or workflows that appear over the user interface. Depending on the kind of Dialog, further interactions may be blocked until the Dialog is acknowledged.

 [View documentation](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/react-spectrum/Dialog.html)

entities.name: Divider
entities.description:
## Divider

Dividers bring clarity to a layout by grouping and dividing content in close proximity. They can also be used to establish rhythm and hierarchy.

 [View documentation](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/react-spectrum/Divider.html)

entities.name: Link
entities.description:
## Link

Links allow users to navigate to a different location. They can be presented inline inside a paragraph or as standalone text.

 [View documentation](https://react-spectrum.adobe.com/react-spectrum/Link.html)
